name: The Secret Weirdo Society (Lachlan Shelton)
description:
What's it about?

The Secret Weirdo Society is a first-person indie survival horror game based in an underground society of crazy people who really, really hate "normal" people and believe they are special or gifted in some kind of way. You've been taken into their society. Will you die normal or live long enough to become a weirdo?
